name: Responsive Attention Box
author: Bledar Ramo

sections.description:
Responsive Attention Box is a plugin that helps push important messages onto the screen
and your users.Images and jQuery have been used to enhance the User Experience.
You can easily display custom texts, Twitter posts RSS feeds etc .
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘attention-boxes’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Page or Posts and use shortcodes

[label style=”success”]Well done! You successfully read this important alert message.  [/label]
[label style=”info”]Head up! This alert needs your attention, but its not super important.  [/label]
[label style=”failed rounded”]Oh snap! Change a few things up and try submitting again.  [/label]
[label style=”success rounded”]Well done! You successfully read this important alert message.  [/label]
[label style=”info rounded”]Head up! This alert needs your attention, but its not super important.  [/label]
